title: Machine Learning Practical Skills Enhancement: Understanding and Applying Cultural Influences in Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Online Learning Experience and Basic Cultural Competence
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three ways their cultural background influences online learning design.
Learners can revise their instructional design approaches in two ways based on peer feedback in asynchronous discussion forums.
Through reflective journals, learners can identify one online learning barrier arising from cultural differences and propose solutions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
